title: NA Challenger Series Schedule Question
body: With the recent disbanding of TSM Darkness, in the challenger series this week will Team Fusion have a bye or play someone else?  Lolesports has not been updated with this information yet.  Thanks for the help.

replies.body:
To clarify, the team did not disband. TSM decided to drop the title name sponsorship of the TSM Darkness so they'll be known as a new team name soon. 

The team is still part of the Challenger Series and will play Team Fusion this week.
